articles.title: Final Firefox version with Windows XP, plugin support released today
articles.description: Firefox 52 also includes support for WebAssembly.

articles.title: After NSA hacking exposé, CIA staffers asked where Equation Group went wrong
articles.description: CIA hackers wasted no time analyzing the blunders made by their NSA counterparts.

articles.description: Hyperloop One released photos on Tuesday morning at a railway conference in Dubai.

articles.title: Italian firm thinks Facebook’s “Nearby Places” is a copycat, gets feature shut down
articles.description: Court ordered Facebook to suspend the feature or pay 5,000 euros per day.

articles.title: Americans’ sex lives have gone limp—lovemaking fell ~15% since the ’90s
articles.description: Decline linked to more singletons and less frisky married couples.

articles.title: Don’t read too much into the Switch’s successful launch numbers
